title: Avocado Chicken Salad (Mayo Free)
directions: In a small bowl, mash the avocado with the lime juice and mix in the brown mustard, garlic powder, and salt and pepper.
Mix in the chopped chicken breast and chopped veggies.
Serve on your favorite bread, crackers, or vegetables.
ingredients: 1 dash Salt and pepper to taste
1/2 cup chopped vegetables of choice I used chopped radishes, carrots, and purple cabbage in mine
